job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s degree in Project Management, Business, Engineering, and Digital Media or equivalent combination of education and experience

jd: From: Devyani Kumari, Absolute IT devyani@absoluting.com Reply to: devyani@absoluting.com Producer/Project Manager Job Location: Salina, Kansas Overview: Pure Imagination Labs' Producer provides high-level management and low-level production support for the company’s interactive and linear content development projects, helping to facilitate the company’s overall strategic, financial, and creative goals across various platforms. o Required On-Site: This position is required to be performed full-time o Required Residence: This candidate must live or reside in the state of Kansas; or relocate within six (6) months of offered employment. Basic Qualifications: • Bachelor’s degree in Project Management, Business, Engineering, and Digital Media is required or equivalent combination of education and experience. • Minimum 7-10 years of experience as a Producer or Project Manager in interactive development, with a track record from concept to delivery. • PMP (Project Management Professional), PMI-ACP, or equivalent certification preferred. • Solid expertise in resource management, scheduling, and budgeting using Agile, Waterfall, and rapid prototyping methodologies. • Proficiency in office software (e.g., Microsoft Office Suite, Google Workspace). Additional Qualifications: • Experience in managing comprehensive documentation systems, ensuring accuracy and version control. • Proven risk management and problem-solving skills, including producing risk assessments and contingency plans. • Familiarity with technical specifications for software integration and hardware setups. • Experience in content development for location-based projects. • Proficiency with project management software like Notion, Smart sheets, or similar tools. • Knowledge of AI tools and their application in workflow optimization. • Strong verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to interact effectively with internal teams, external vendors, and other stakeholders. • Ability to handle sensitive information with confidentiality and professionalism.
